main event: Witnesses reported observing a large, saucer-shaped object in the sky over Traverse City, Michigan, which changed colors and was larger than a star.
interesting points: Multiple witnesses spotted the object with a distinct hump in the middle, The sighting lasted for approximately half an hour, The object was noted to be bright and emitted no sound, Observers estimated the object at about the size of a large bomber aircraft, The object appeared to hover and then accelerate rapidly out of sight.
witness description: Various individuals reported their sightings, including those in aircraft and civilians on the ground.
